name: Chatterbox NoiseTracker
short_description:
Chatterbox NoiseTracker is a free and open-source noise tracker that has many features, such as:
-5 built-in presets
-a custom noise setting
-noise alerts
-"excuse" button
-nice interface
summary: Chatterbox NoiseTracker is a free noise tracker that has many features
